Description

Professional level power to your home studio

Vegas Movie Studio Platinum Edition HD has everything you need to create stunning HD movies. Edit video in nearly any format including HDV and AVCHD. The powerful features for video compositing, color correction and creation of soundtracks help achieve feature-film results in your home studio. Use the tools surround sound mixing to create soundtracks in 5.1 format. Choose from hundreds of video effects, titles and filters professional 2D and 3D. Exclusive Show Me How interactive tutorials from Sony will help familiarize you with the program right away.

Standard or High Definition

Edit video in nearly any format including HDV and AVCHD ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â‚¬Å¾Ã‚Â¢. Work on the same project simultaneously in standard definition and high definition.

Easy creation and recording on DVD and Blu-ray Disc ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â‚¬Å¾Ã‚Â¢

With DVD Architect ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â‚¬Å¾Ã‚Â¢ Studio software included can easily create and burn DVD and Blu-ray Disc professional-looking menus, buttons, backgrounds and navigation items. Including 56 simple subjects to become familiar with the program.

New Device Explorer

Use the new Windows Explorer to quickly move devices for the content of AVCHD devices, hard disks, Memory Stick ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â‚¬Å¾Ã‚Â¢. Media quickly display the device and import the files into the software, maximizing the speed of workflow by importing only the necessary files without any conversion.

Improve and stabilize the video

Choose from hundreds of video effects, titles and filters professional 2D and 3D. Automatic correction tools, advanced color faded enhance the footage. Use the video stabilization to retrieve videos with tremors.

Assistants for new projects and creating movies

The new project wizard performs a simple process that ensures that projects are created correctly from the beginning. The new Make Movie wizard eliminates the guesswork in delivery and provides optimized performance for Web, DVD, email or publishing of films on YouTube.

Share your creations

CD burning, DVD and Blu-ray Disc is fully integrated into the software Vegas Movie Studio Platinum HD 10, which allows you to easily create professional discs. Record audio one track at a time or choose disc-burning (DAO) to have absolute control over the pauses between tracks. Media quickly record the time scale on DVD or Blu-ray Disc or create a project, complete with custom menus and graphics to DVD Architect Studio software included

New Customizable window layouts

Organize and save the environment edition of Vegas Movie Studio Platinum HD 10 so that fit the way you work. You can also anchor floating windows interface and reorganizing the way that best suits your needs. Create, save and retrieve different interface designs for various editing tasks.

Learning on the fly with simple tutorials

The exclusive Show Me How tutorials guide you through the entire creative process. When I need help, just click Show Me How button and choose an issue of the tutorial. Through useful dialog boxes, pointers, and guides will show you what to do and where to click.
